body:
(Im not trying to spam, but am saying i am leaving avicus)(Be assured you wont see me on servers, maybe sometimes on forums) Thank you for the best experience ever, from this server :')

Reason: I wont state, lets just say something happen in my family, and i have to go.

title: Good-bye.

replies.body: The Avicus forums are not meant to be a social network to update people with your personal life, please stop with these kinds of topics.
